item.description: Opening the Heart: Meditations on How to Be is a workshop for 6 - 12 people based on a set of meditation cards created by Linda Lewis and Kathryn Sameulson. This is a workshop for those on the journey of our times, for those who are participating in the paradigm shift that is happening now. This set of two-sided cards is based on some of the dualities of life - the contemplation of which can help us figure out how we want to be in relation to ourselves, others, the world, and the divine. This is the beginning of the journey of finding how you want to be in relation to yourself, others, the world and the divine. Bring yourself, a pen and some a paper for this workshop of meditation, journaling and conversation. It is conducted in a safe and loving atmosphere. Cost is $30.00

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Opening up the Heart Meditation, with Kathryn Samuelson
